title: "Good"
review: Rani Mahal, located inside the Taragarh Fort of Ajmer is a pavilion that Wass Built for the Queens, courtsans and mistresses of the rules of ajmer.

title: One time visit.
review: Not a must visit spot in Ajmer. But if u have ample of time u can spend few hours to have a look at the Rajasthani Architectured Fort.

title: Good Place
review: Rani Mahal is located inside the Taragarh Fort. Structure of Rani Mahal is of Rajasthani Architecture style. An average visit and can be avoided.

title: Palace of Queen
review: Located in the Taragarh fort, this Palace today comprises of faded murals and broken stained glass windows.The structure displays typical Rajasthani architecture.Perfect for history buff.

title: Rani mahal
review: Rani mahal is good tourist place.this is attractive place to everyone. Must see location for everyone.

title: Obscure sight
review: This small building (or rather, the sort of pavilion), loudly called palace (if I understand correctly, "mahal" means "palace"), is a rather incomprehensible sight. It is not completely destroyed but is in very poor condition. The only thing that somehow gives meaning to visit here, it's the good views of the trough in the mountain ridge of Aravali, in which lie Ajmer and Pushkar

title: You can skip the place if you are not keen on Ancient ruined places
review: The place is in ruins, Its inside the Taragarh fort, the place clearly paints a sad Reminiscent past of this glorious palace but now it lies in ruins and absolute degrade of architecture. It used to be a palace but now I a not sure anyone can relate to that. But if you have an extra day on the itinerary go ahead.

title: Ruined place
review: This is a ruined place with lack of maintenance and care. The place has left few things to see and it is not a very common place of interest for tourists.

title: "Jarjar Stambh"
review: Rani Mahal, located inside the Taragarh Fort, was built for the wives, concubines and paramours of the rulers of Ajmer.

title: An Average Spot
review: Rani Mahal was built for wives, concubines and paramours of the Rulers is situated in Taragarh Fort. This edifice comprises of faded murals and broken glass windows. Structure of Rani Mahal is of Rajasthani Architecture style. An average visit and can be avoided.

title: For the nice top view
review: The mahal is inside Talagarh fort. The place is good for bird-eye view of Ajmet city and nice sun-set over Aravali Range.
